q1.body: https://the-wired.vercel.app/ does not host any content. When you click on something to watch, the wired is searched for the selected media (On the loading screen and in the 'video sources' tab you can see which source you're using). Media never gets uploaded by https://the-wired.vercel.app/, everything is through this searching mechanism.
q1.title: Where does the content come from?

q3.body: content is viewed through sources on the wired
q3.title: Where can I have anothger movie?

q4.body: Please fire all your neurons at once.
q4.title: Where can I have another stroke?

q5.body: All data is synced to the sudo-backend which is different than the community backend and is independently hosted by me, anyone is free to use this as well.
q5.title: What about my data and stuff?

q6.title: How can I find out more?

downloads.disclaimer: Downloads are taken directly from the provider. the-wired does not have control over how the downloads are provided.
downloads.hlsDisclaimer:
Downloads are taken directly from the provider. the-wired does not have control over how the downloads are provided.

Please note that you are downloading an HLS playlist, it is not recommended to download if you are not familiar with advanced streaming formats. Try different sources for different formats.

onAndroid.1: To download on Android, click the download button then, on the new page, <bold>tap and hold</bold> on the video, then select <bold>save</bold>.
onAndroid.title: Downloading on Android

onIos.1: To download on iOS, click the download button then, on the new page, click <bold><ios_share /></bold>, then <bold>Save to Files <ios_files /></bold>.
onIos.title: Downloading on iOS

onPc.1: On PC, click the download button then, on the new page, right click the video and select <bold>Save video as</bold>
onPc.title: Downloading on PC

downloads.title: Download
